name: Initial S: The Massacre of the Innocents
description: Initial S: The Massacre of the Innocents; Master of Gerona (Italian, active about 1300); Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; late 13th century; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 58.3 × 40.2 cm (22 15/16 × 15 13/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig VI 6, fol. 224v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Initial S: The Massacre of the Innocents
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
